titles.title: Condemning the violent, anti-American and anti-Israel protests that are occurring on campuses of institutions of higher education nationwide.
Condemning the violent, anti-American and anti-Israel protests that are occurring on campuses of institutions of higher education nationwide.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

bill.summary: This resolution expresses the sense of the House of Representatives to (1) condemn the violent, anti-American, and anti-Israel protests that are occurring on campuses of institutions of higher education; and (2) thank law enforcement in New York, New York, and in Chapel Hill, North Carolina, and individuals at the University of North Carolina.
